MacroOp.Name: OMNI_OBJECT_NAME
MacroOp.Brief: If defined, adds a @c name string member to each object.
MacroOp.Description: If this macro is defined, then any classes in the library that can be instantiated (e.g. non-abstract classes and non-POD types) will have an omni::string_t member called @c name that can be used to name an object.
MacroOp.Synopsis: Defining this macro will add an extra member to each object.
